author: AwesomeInRed

changelog.release_notes:
version 2.13
- fix incorrect detection for thunderstorm condition in weatherunderground api

version 2.12
- add condition check for drizzle in wunderground api

version 2.11
-updated app icon for pebble time round

version 2.10
-fix bluetooth connectivity issue causing weather info not to be displayed
-add option for bluetooth connection vibration alert
version 2.9

version 2.8
- fix weather icon for rain not displayed correctly

version 2.7
- minor layout adjustment for date

version 2.6
- minor code optimization
- update reduced app icon file size

version 2.5
-set to hide weather icon only when timeline quick view is shown

version 2.4
-implement unobstructed area

version 2.3
-fix location not displayed at launch
-add app glance icon

version 2.2
- update data fetching algorithm
- add two more weather data source
- icon alignment adjustment
version 2.1 fix weather icon ocassionally fail to display

version 2.0
-improve weather data fetching algorithm
-add weather data source option
-fix display issues on pebble time round
version 1.10 always update weather display on start up with cached data to prevent blank info displayed
version 1.9 display weather info based on stored data when failed to retrieve weather info
version 1.8 load latest weather info if request failed to update weather info during start up to prevent empty/blank weather info
version 1.7 fix battery level colour issue
version 1.6 added language locale support and date display preference
version 1.5 minor alignment adjustment to battery level

description:
Watchface features:
- Simple, clean and easy to read display
- Location based weather info
- Multiple choice source for weather data
- Battery level display
- Customizable colours
- Date format display preference
- Temperature unit display preference
- Supports Timeline Quick View display
- Supports language locale for date*
- Supports Pebble Time and Pebble Time Round
- Animation option
- Bluetooth connection vibration alert option

*language settings set based on watch language settings at pebble mobile app

Thanks for the awesome feedback and support!

Weather data powered by:
-OpenWeatherMap (http://openweathermap.org/)
-Weather Underground (https://www.wunderground.com/)
-Dark Sky (https://darksky.net/)
-Yahoo! Weather (https://www.yahoo.com/news/weather)

latest_release.release_notes:
version 2.13

title: Weathers Time
